QuestData.Title: Welcome to Highbank!
QuestData.Description: Welcome to the highlands, soldier. You're here just in time.$B$BHorde troops just launched an assault from the air. Step up and do something about it. Clear them out!
QuestData.CompletionText: You'll have to kill a few more than that, soldier.
QuestData.RewardText: That's more like it. We should be able to mop this up from here.
